title: CBA Proposal Updates, NFL Combine Buzz, Top RB Prospect Interviews (Football 2/27)
description:
Ryan Wilson is joined by Brady Quinn, Jason La Canfora and Jamey Eisenberg to discuss the latest happenings from the NFL Combine in Indianapolis and from around the league. The guys start by addressing the latest with the CBA proposal, player's reactions and the next step in the process (1:20). Ryan, Brady, Jason and Jamey then talk about Jalen Hurts' pro potential (11:45), Chase Young not working out (16:45), Henry Ruggs highly-anticipated 40-yard dash (18:40) and possible rookie fantasy studs. Next, a look at the verbal commitments the Cowboys have issued for Dak Prescott (26:30) and the one the Panthers gave for Cam Newton (34:30). Finally, hear from several top running back prospects courtesy interviews conducted by the CBS Sports HQ team on Wednesday in Indy. In order: J.K. Dobbins (40:00), Jonathan Taylor (45:00), Clyde Edwards-Helaire (47:30), Cam Akers (54:00), D'Andre Swift (57:00) and Zack Moss (1:02:45).

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @ryanwilsoncbs, @Brady_Quinn, @JasonLaCanfora and @jameyeisnberg
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
